event.description: Skip Schumaker flies out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Colby Rasmus strikes out swinging.
Albert Pujols flies out to left fielder Laynce Nix.
Ryan Ludwick walks.
Chris Duncan lines out to left fielder Laynce Nix.
Yadier Molina flies out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Khalil Greene flies out to left fielder Laynce Nix.
Joe Thurston grounds out, shortstop Paul Janish to first baseman Ramon Hernandez.
Joel Pineiro flies out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Skip Schumaker singles on a line drive to left fielder Laynce Nix.
Colby Rasmus flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Albert Pujols strikes out swinging.
Ryan Ludwick flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Chris Duncan pops out to third baseman Adam Rosales in foul territory.
Yadier Molina strikes out swinging.
Khalil Greene doubles (4) on a line drive to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Joe Thurston walks.
Joel Pineiro out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Ryan Hanigan to second baseman Jerry Hairston. Khalil Greene to 3rd. Joe Thurston to 2nd.
Skip Schumaker lines out sharply, pitcher Johnny Cueto to first baseman Ramon Hernandez.
Colby Rasmus lines out to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Albert Pujols grounds out, shortstop Paul Janish to first baseman Ramon Hernandez.
Ryan Ludwick grounds out, second baseman Jerry Hairston to first baseman Ramon Hernandez.
Chris Duncan singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Yadier Molina singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jay Bruce. Chris Duncan to 2nd.
Khalil Greene singles on a line drive to left fielder Laynce Nix. Chris Duncan to 3rd. Yadier Molina to 2nd.
Joe Thurston grounds into a double play, second baseman Jerry Hairston to shortstop Paul Janish to first baseman Ramon Hernandez. Chris Duncan scores. Yadier Molina to 3rd. Khalil Greene out at 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Brian Barden replaces Joel Pineiro.
Brian Barden flies out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Pitching Change: Arthur Rhodes replaces Johnny Cueto, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Shane Robinson replaces Skip Schumaker.
Shane Robinson flies out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Tyler Greene replaces Colby Rasmus.
Pitching Change: David Weathers replaces Arthur Rhodes, batting 9th.
Tyler Greene homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Albert Pujols grounds out, shortstop Paul Janish to first baseman Ramon Hernandez.
Ryan Ludwick walks.
With Chris Duncan batting, Ryan Ludwick steals (2) 2nd base.
Chris Duncan doubles (9) on a line drive to right fielder Jay Bruce. Ryan Ludwick scores.
Yadier Molina singles on a line drive to center fielder Willy Taveras. Chris Duncan scores.
Pitching Change: Jared Burton replaces David Weathers, batting 9th.
Khalil Greene pops out to shortstop Paul Janish.
Pitching Change: Francisco Cordero replaces Jared Burton, batting 9th, replacing Chris Dickerson.
Joe Thurston walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jason LaRue replaces Brad Thompson.
With Jason LaRue batting, Joe Thurston caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Ryan Hanigan to second baseman Jerry Hairston.
Jason LaRue strikes out swinging.
Shane Robinson grounds out, shortstop Paul Janish to first baseman Ramon Hernandez.
Willy Taveras singles on a soft ground ball to catcher Yadier Molina, deflected by third baseman Joe Thurston.
Jerry Hairston doubles (3) on a line drive to left fielder Chris Duncan. Willy Taveras scores.
Jay Bruce grounds out, second baseman Skip Schumaker to first baseman Albert Pujols. Jerry Hairston to 3rd.
Ramon Hernandez singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Ryan Ludwick. Jerry Hairston scores.
Laynce Nix grounds into a double play, second baseman Skip Schumaker to shortstop Khalil Greene to first baseman Albert Pujols. Ramon Hernandez out at 2nd.
Adam Rosales singles on a ground ball to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Ryan Hanigan singles on a line drive to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Adam Rosales to 3rd.
Paul Janish strikes out swinging.
Johnny Cueto hits a sacrifice bunt. Throwing error by pitcher Joel Pineiro. Adam Rosales scores. Ryan Hanigan to 3rd. Johnny Cueto to 2nd.
Willy Taveras singles on a ground ball to left fielder Chris Duncan. Ryan Hanigan scores. Johnny Cueto to 3rd.
Jerry Hairston singles on a line drive to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Johnny Cueto scores. Willy Taveras to 3rd.
Jay Bruce lines into an unassisted double play, first baseman Albert Pujols. Jerry Hairston doubled off 1st.
Ramon Hernandez grounds out, shortstop Khalil Greene to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Laynce Nix flies out to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Adam Rosales pops out to catcher Yadier Molina in foul territory.
Ryan Hanigan singles on a line drive to right fielder Ryan Ludwick.
Paul Janish pops out to shortstop Khalil Greene.
Johnny Cueto strikes out on a foul bunt.
Willy Taveras grounds into a force out, third baseman Joe Thurston to second baseman Skip Schumaker. Ryan Hanigan out at 2nd.
Jerry Hairston grounds out sharply, third baseman Joe Thurston to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Jay Bruce flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Ramon Hernandez called out on strikes.
Laynce Nix grounds out, first baseman Albert Pujols to pitcher Joel Pineiro.
Adam Rosales flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Ryan Hanigan grounds out, shortstop Khalil Greene to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Pitching Change: Chris Perez replaces Joel Pineiro, batting 9th, replacing Brian Barden.
Paul Janish doubles (3) on a line drive to right fielder Ryan Ludwick.
Johnny Cueto reaches on a fielder's choice out, first baseman Albert Pujols to third baseman Joe Thurston. Paul Janish out at 3rd. Johnny Cueto to 2nd.
With Willy Taveras batting, wild pitch by Chris Perez, Johnny Cueto to 3rd.
Willy Taveras walks.
Jerry Hairston pops out to catcher Yadier Molina in foul territory.
Jay Bruce singles on a line drive to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Johnny Cueto scores. Willy Taveras to 2nd.
With Ramon Hernandez batting, passed ball by Yadier Molina, Willy Taveras to 3rd. Jay Bruce to 2nd.
Ramon Hernandez walks.
Laynce Nix grounds out, pitcher Chris Perez to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Shane Robinson remains in the game as the center fielder.
Tyler Greene remains in the game as the second baseman.
Pitching Change: Brad Thompson replaces Chris Perez, batting 9th.
Adam Rosales singles on a ground ball to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Ryan Hanigan out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Brad Thompson to second baseman Tyler Greene. Adam Rosales to 2nd.
Paul Janish grounds out, third baseman Joe Thurston to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Dickerson replaces Jared Burton.
Chris Dickerson strikes out on a foul tip.
